statements: DELETE FROM road_closures WHERE closure_date = '2022-10-15' AND reason LIKE '%construction%';
DELETE FROM detours WHERE is_active = FALSE;
DELETE FROM road_closures WHERE road_name = 'Main Street' AND closure_start_date > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM detours WHERE is_active = false AND start_location = 'City Center';
DELETE FROM planned_routes WHERE route_name = 'Main Street' AND route_start = '2022-03-01 08:00:00';
DELETE FROM planned_routes WHERE route_name = 'Main Street';
